titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain sleeping bags.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/5/2008--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on certain sleeping bags.
